web_snippets: July 27, 2024. USA Cricket has announced the appointment of Johnathan Atkeison as its new CEO, effective August 1st, 2024.
Johnathan Atkeison. Chief Executive Officer at USA Cricket. USA Cricket Middle Tennessee State University. Westminster, Colorado, United States.
Johnathan Atkeison joined USA Cricket as Chief Executive Officer in August of 2024, following a thirteen-year career with USA Rugby.
